channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 13th January

item.title: 2 very large potholes next to each other, 13th January
item.description:
On left-hand side of road coming from Churchdown towards the house. Two large potholes very close to each other.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 13th January
item.description:
This manhole cover has been causing such loud noises since November. I have reported it to Glos highways department and Severn Trent water. Highways did a temporary fix 30th December. This worked for approximately 4 days (see full attached email)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Caravan dumped on New Street, 13th January
item.description:
A caravan has been dumped outside 73c New Street since 17 December 2025. It appears to be occupied at least some of the time. It is not illuminated at night. It blocks the daylight from 73c New Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, New Street, St Paulâ€™s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
